objectives.name: Budgeting
objectives.description: Establish a formal, owned, and communicated annual budget process

objectives.name: Financial Controls
objectives.description: Implement basic financial controls and segregation of duties

objectives.name: Variance Management
objectives.description: Establish monthly variance analysis with accountability

objectives.name: Forecasting
objectives.description: Implement rolling forecasts with documented assumptions

objectives.name: Driver-Based Planning
objectives.description: Link financial models to operational drivers and unit economics

objectives.name: Scenario Planning
objectives.description: Build multi-scenario models with trigger-based contingencies

objectives.name: Integrated Planning
objectives.description: Connect planning across functions with live system integration

objectives.name: Predictive Analytics
objectives.description: Deploy ML-based forecasting and real-time anomaly detection
